title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Rugby Place-Kick Success Factors Analysis and Simulation-Based Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics proficiency and foundational knowledge of exercise mechanics
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify 11 core constraints affecting placekick success rates with 85% accuracy
Learners can classify success probabilities by kick angle/distance into three levels (low/medium/high) using simulation tools
Teams can predict the impact of environmental variables (wind, fatigue, etc.) on success rates with over 70% accuracy through developed kick simulation models
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
